code: import{Scrollbars}from'react-custom-scrollbars-2';import{useState}from'react';import{CloseIcon}from'../../shared/icons/CloseIcon';import{Button}from'../../shared/buttons/button/Button';import css from'./column.module.scss';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Column=_ref=>{let{id,state,title}=_ref;const[tasks,setTasks]=useState([]);const[inputValue,setInputValue]=useState('');const onChangeImputValue=event=>{setInputValue(event.target.value);};const onClickAddTask=()=>{if(inputValue&&!tasks.includes(inputValue)){setTasks(prev=>[...prev,inputValue]);setInputValue('');}else{alert("Please write some task into input");}};const deleteTaskFromList=index=>{setTasks(tasks.filter((_,_index)=>_index!=index));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:css.column,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:css.header,children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:css.wrapper,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:css.body,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Scrollbars,{autoHeight:true,autoHeightMax:500,children:[tasks&&tasks.map((task,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:css.card,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:css.card,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:task}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:css['button-remove'],onClick:()=>deleteTaskFromList(index),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CloseIcon,{})})]})},index)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Write some task",value:inputValue,onChange:onChangeImputValue})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:css.footer,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:onClickAddTask,children:"+"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Add task"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",children:"Hide"})]})]})]});};
